ISSUE.TITLE: Property 'autoStoreVariables' used by script task is mising in Flowable Modeler
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: The property `autoStoreVariables` used by script task can not be set to `true` using the Flowable Modeler 6.3.1. No checkbox is displayed in the editor. Reading `flowable-ui-modeler-logic/src/main/resources/stencilset_bpmn.json`, it seems to me that this property is missing. Regards, Christophe

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Shut down async history executor when cmmn engine is closed (in case it's shared between cmmn and process engine: calling shutdown() multiple times has no impact)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add property autoStoreVariables to BPMN modeler (resolves #1289)
